snippet.title: DanceDanceRevolution 2009 Trailer (High Quality)
snippet.description:
This is the trailer for the upcoming DanceDanceRevolution game coming to the PS2, PS3, Xbox 360 and Wii systems this fall.

Known songlist:

Licenses (total of 30 expected):
Boogie Wonderland / Earth, Wind & Fire
Bonafield Lovin' / Chromeo
Closer / Ne-Yo
Daft Punk Is Playing At My House / LCD Soundsystem
Disturbia / Rihanna
Dream On Dreamer / Brand New Heavies
Feel Good Inc. / Gorillaz
I'm Coming Out / Diana Ross
Ice Ice Baby / Vanilla Ice
Let's Get It Started / Black Eyed Peas
One Step At A Time / Jordin Sparks
My Prerogative / Bobby Brown
Pocketful of Sunshine / Natasha Bedingfield
Pork & Beans / Weezer
Rio / Duran Duran
Space Dance / Danny Tenaglia
Viva La Vida / Coldplay
When I Grow Up / The Pussycat Dolls

KONAMI Originals (20 or more expected)
A Brighter Day / NAOKI feat. Alisha G
DYNAMITE RAVE / NAOKI
Taking It To The Sky / U1 feat. Tammy S Hansen
What Will Come Of Me / Black Rose Garden

Pre-order links:

PS3:
http://www.amazon.com/DanceDanceRevol...

Wii:
http://www.amazon.com/DanceDanceRevol...

Playstation 2:

http://www.amazon.com/DanceDanceRevol...

Xbox 360:
http://www.amazon.com/DanceDanceRevol...
